description: Try our easy to follow Rare Roast Beef Canapes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rare Roast Beef Canapes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs micro herbs (e.g. basil, to garnish)
150g rare roast beef, sliced, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cucumber into 1cm thick rounds. Using a teaspoon, scoop out a little of the centre from each slice.
Combine the mayonnaise and wasabi in a small bowl.
Place a little wasabi mayonnaise into the hollow of each cucumber slice. Top with rare roast beef and garnish with micro herbs.
